user.description: Setup your Too Good To Go account

item_ids.description:
Optional item IDs to collect

By default this integration only collects favourite items from the app, if you want to see other items, add them here.

captcha.description:
Additional verification is required [click here]({url}) to continue.

Once the captcha is solved, return back here and press submit.

progress.login:
Click the magic link in your mailbox on PC to continue...
(Opening the email on mobile won't work, if you have the Too Good To Go app installed.)

abort.unknown_login_error: Authentication failed. Check the logs for more information.
